function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of detailed connection between health and green space","Impact":"Difficulty in understanding the direct influence of green space on health","Mitigation":"Conducting further research and studies to establish a clearer connection between green space and health","Technologies":"Research tools and data analysis software","People":"Urban residents, public health officials, urban planners","Owner":"Research organizations, public health agencies, urban planning departments"},{"Description":"Subjective sensations and emotions impacting perceptions of well-being","Impact":"Difficulty in accurately assessing the impact of green space on emotional health","Mitigation":"Incorporating diverse perspectives and experiences in studies, considering subjective factors in analysis","Technologies":"Qualitative research methods, psychological assessment tools","People":"Researchers, psychologists, urban residents","Owner":"Research institutions, mental health organizations, urban planning departments"},{"Description":"Inadequate health and environmental impact assessment of urban green space","Impact":"Inability to fully understand the overall impact of green space on public health and the environment","Mitigation":"Conducting comprehensive assessments and evaluations, integrated health and environmental impact studies","Technologies":"GIS mapping, environmental monitoring equipment, health data analysis software","People":"Urban residents, environmental advocates, public health officials","Owner":"Environmental agencies, public health agencies, urban planning departments"}]}
